msg: Requests after the connector has been stopped may time out or return 503s - varies by connector. Make sure the test passes with either.

author: markt
msg: Relax the requirement that directories must have a name ending in .jar to be treated as an expanded JAR file by the default JarScanner.
Based on patch by Rodion Zhitomirsky.
